hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Goron City#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Ruto's Letter# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest
Bottom of the Well MQ Dead Hand Freestanding Key

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: This Gossip Stone Is Dedicated to Those Who Perished Before Ganon Was Defeated.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.
